channel.title: Comments on: Weeks Three to Four

item.title: By: Josh
item.dc:creator: Josh
item.description: Damn Eric, yours is going to be on the road before mine haha.
item.content:encoded: Damn Eric, yours is going to be on the road before mine haha.

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2014/07/weeks-three-to-four/#comment-91584">Rob</a>.
Thanks Rob. I was at the shop the other day and we were just contemplating if those brackets should be removed. Once the engine is mounted for its final installation, the decision will be made then.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Rob.

Thanks Rob. I was at the shop the other day and we were just contemplating if those brackets should be removed. Once the engine is mounted for its final installation, the decision will be made then.

item.title: By: Rob
item.dc:creator: Rob
item.description:
you are going to want to cut off or drill out those spot welded brackets that run along the frame rail as seen on pic 5
they will be in the way of ac and alt components
item.content:encoded:
you are going to want to cut off or drill out those spot welded brackets that run along the frame rail as seen on pic 5

they will be in the way of ac and alt components
